## âš¡ Super Quick Guide

1. **Click** the link above (or go to Issues â†’ New Issue â†’ "Add Quiz Entry")
2. **Fill** the form:

## ğŸ†˜ Common Issues

### "Required field is missing"
â†’ Fill all fields with * (asterisk)

### "Invalid date format"
â†’ Use `DD.MM.YYYY` with dots (e.g., 05.10.2025)

### "Photos not uploading"
â†’ Try pasting instead of drag-drop
â†’ Check file size (keep under 10MB each)

### "Website not updating"
â†’ Wait 5 minutes, then force-refresh (Ctrl+F5)
â†’ Check if issue was closed successfully
â†’ Look at Actions tab for errors
